author: zkfloof
content: Is it possible to tell if an ethereum account has been front-run in any of its dex interactions? Would be a useful service i think

author: zkfloof
content: I guess it would work by checking your transactions and seeing if another transaction from a different address tried to get in the same block by paying a higher than normal gas price for the same contract function

author: zkfloof
content: but i think that would require transaction pool historical data
